section.section: No later than October 1st of each year, a code county in the Western Maryland class shall prepare a report on the hotel rental tax for public distribution.
The report shall be published in a newspaper of general circulation in the county and posted on the county's Internet website.

The report shall include:
The amount of revenue the county collected from the hotel rental tax in the previous fiscal year;
An itemized statement of the use of hotel rental tax revenue; and
The name and salary of each position within the county agency that administers the hotel rental tax.

text.section: A code county in the Western Maryland class shall provide a copy of any audits performed annually relating to the hotel rental tax to the county Senate and House Delegations of the General Assembly.
